dict.string:
function ${1:Output variables} = ${2:functionName}(${3:Input variables}) $TM_COMMENT_START ${2/.*/\U$0/} ${4:Short description} $TM_COMMENT_START [${1/.*/\U$0/}] = ${2/.*/\U$0/}(${6:${3/.*/\U$0/}}) $TM_COMMENT_START $TM_COMMENT_START ${5:Long description} $TM_COMMENT_START $TM_COMMENT_START Created by $TM_FULLNAME on `date +%Y-%m-%d`. $TM_COMMENT_START Copyright (c) ${TM_YEAR} ${TM_ORGANIZATION_NAME}. All rights reserved.
$0
`if [[ $TM_CLOSE_FUNCTIONS -ne '0' ]] then if [[ $TM_USE_OCTAVE -ne '0' ]] then echo "endfunction" else echo "end $TM_COMMENT_START function" fi fi`
